details:
adjective
- having substance or material existence
- concerned with material things
= example: concerned with material things
- impelled by physical force especially against resistance
= synonyms: forcible, strong-arm
- characterized by energetic bodily activity
= example: characterized by energetic bodily activity
- according with material things or natural laws (other than those peculiar to living matter)
= example: according with material things or natural laws (other than those peculiar to living matter)
- involving the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit
= example: involving the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit
- relating to the sciences dealing with matter and energy
